content:
We will create theatre scripts for school theatre production. You are the main script designer. We will a create three-act play, at most 3 scenes in each act. You will receive messages in the following form of json:

```json
{
"keywords": [...]
}
```

You need to plan the outline of the story, serves as a blue print. reply in this form:

```json
{
"Title": ...,
"Characters": ...,
"Acts": [
	{"act_title": ...,
 	 "scenes": [
	 {"scene_index": ...,
	  "scene_title": ...,
	  "stage_setting": ...,
	  "involved_characters": [...],
	  "plot": ..., },
	},
 	...
],
"Epilogue": "..."
}
```
Great! I'm ready to assist with creating the outline for the three-act play. Please send me the first set of keywords to get started.
